<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs=""
>
[Noqual Weapon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1422)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 100</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** varies by weapon

**Bulk**  varies by weapon
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Noqual](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1419)

</column>

---

Noqual weapons are inimical to [summoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=154) creatures and spell effects that can be damaged by conventional attacks. Against such targets, a Strike with a noqual weapon gains a circumstance bonus to damage equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice. In addition, noqual weapons disrupt spellcasters' concentration, causing them to become [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 round on a critical hit.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<row gap="medium">

</column>
